name: Unus ID
overview:
Unus ID is an internet mobile application that enables to enter a business card into a mobile or PC in less than 10 seconds.

In addition, you will be able to back up and restore your address book in the cloud.

● Fast: Users obtain all the information of a business card into their mobile device or PC in less than 10 seconds by simply entering the Unus ID (mobile number) into the app or web

● Safe: Backup in the cloud preventing the loss of data in the event of mobile device change or loss

● Remote Access: Users are able to access their address book from any location through our website

● Automatic Update: Any change of the profile is notified and automatically updated to user’s network

● Privacy: There is not public access. Only the user’s contacts are enabled to have access to contact details. In addition, users have the option of approving automatically new contacts, or instead, only by prior request and acceptance

● Multi-profile: Possibility of having different profiles using the same Unus ID. This is particularly advantageous for those people that work for different companies or for those requiring more control over their privacy

● No Paper Cards’ Dependency: Unus ID connects the real world with the virtual one, avoiding the dependency on paper business cards. In the event of forgetting the business cards, the exchange of contact details can be done by just providing the Unus ID (mobile phone number)

milestones.description: Unus ID received seed funding from Ben Oldman Venture Fund
